response.original_title: 関西ジャニーズJr_のお笑いスター誕生！
response.overview: It is a youth drama that the member of Kansai Jazz Jr. starred, and the comic talent combi which does not sell and competes with the rival and draws the growth. Yukichi takahama and Jun inage who love laughing in the childhood friend enter the laughing training school after graduation of high school, and form the comic book "endless". He also won the contest as a gate of the new entertainer, and he heard a voice from the TV station, and it seemed like the endless sailing. However, the difference of feelings between takahama and purely lover who laughs and thinks that selling is the first occurs. In the meantime, the "pink pussy" which was the rival in the synchronization suddenly breaks, and the character of the disintegration begins to emerge in the mind of the inhabited in the popular descent of the endless popularity, and it becomes troublesome because it becomes the luggage of takahama. The director was Katsumi Ishikawa who worked on the drama "fishing fool diary".
response.title: 関西ジャニーズJr_のお笑いスター誕生！
